46g PROTEIN
Specialty

BUFFALO CHICKEN PROTEIN PIZZA

Spicy buffalo chicken protein pizza. 46g protein with tangy heat.

46g
Protein
440
Calories
38m
Total Time
2
Yield

Nutrition per 1/2 pizza

Carbs32g
Fat18g
Fiber4g
Sugar4g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 1 protein pizza crust
  • 45ml buffalo sauce
  • 100g shredded mozzarella
  • 100g grilled chicken, diced
  • 30g blue cheese crumbles
  • Celery, diced
  • Ranch drizzle

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prepare

Par-bake protein crust for 8 minutes.

2

Sauce

Spread buffalo sauce over crust.

3

Layer

Add mozzarella, then buffalo-tossed chicken.

4

Bake

Bake at 425¬∞F for 10 minutes.

5

Finish

Top with blue cheese, celery, and ranch drizzle.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
